entry.title: WIND WARNING, Cardston

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers near midnight and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing overnight. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 70 gusting to 100 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:20 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind southwest 70 km/h gusting to 100 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 late in the morning. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:20 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:20 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
